ygData.subject: Re: Which song for soloing?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Well, as a real-life bard (don t ask, just trust me), I can assure you that you CAN indeed sing two songs simultaneously.  It s a neat trick, and when done
ygData.messageBody:
At 09:54 PM 5/13/99 -0700, you wrote:
>From: Kristian Leitzen <kleit@...>
>
>just a question about all this song juggling. what is the roleplaying
>aspect of it. personally i sing one song, because in reality i can
>only sing one song. if roleplaying doesn't matter to you fine, but
>this is just an observation for all you rpers like me.
>in case anybody knows me i am going to have to end my character Olczyk
>on tarew marr soon. long story don't ask. just wish everyone good bye
>from his perspective, and i will be back as some new incarnation soon.
>
>Olczyk

Well, as a real-life bard (don't ask, just trust me), I can assure you that
you CAN indeed sing two songs simultaneously. It's a neat trick, and when
done properly, creates a third, all new song that has it's own sound.

From an RP perspective, it's simply an advanced singing method.

Oh - and I've heard that there's an RP server being requested. I'd be very
interested in seeing how that turns out.


Talies on Bristlebane
http://amtgard.pinkpig.com/bards/eqbard.htm
